summary:
Female replacement mesh for use with Cherry Hotalings CHSBHC mod.
If you don\'t have it, go download it here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888
descriptionHtml:
For use with Cherry Hotalings CHSBHC mod, if you don\'t have it, go here to download & install:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888
This will allow the breast animations to work.

This is a pair of edited mesh files, any texture mods should be compatible ( I tested most of them myself ). [b] If you want to use another mod\'s textures, such as Snow Leopard, which I\'ve seen is really popular, simply use this mesh, and the other mod\'s textures, everything should be fine.[/b]

Many thanks to Cherry\'s help!!

============
A Few Notes
============

I decided to do the forsworn model, just because of the insane number of people who have made textures for it.  So ENJOY!

This armor is really skimpy, and therefore, really animated.  It also does NOT have the underlying underwear portion that the default forsworn armor has.  Sorry, if you\'re going to be a maneating savage, underwear doesn\'t have much place in your outfit, that, and I was being lazy and didn\'t want to deal with reshaping it to fit Cherry\'s models extremely curvy ass.  (it\'s actually really hard to get things to fit on it!)  That and I somehow doubt the target audience for this particular type of stuff is going to lament the absence of some underwear.

Also I reduced the size of the bird-head amulet that comes with the feathers.  I\'m aware most people just strip the feathers away anyway, but for those who don\'t I reduced the size of it so your actual worn amulet is visible while wearing the armor.


========
Optional File Added
========

I just expanded the forsworn boots mesh a little because I was trying to relax after a long day of modding and actually PLAY the game, and the damn clipping issue, which has been there since forever finally irked me so much that I had to stop, and go fix it.

-----------
Known Issues
-----------

There is a slight defect on the right breast when the breast size is reduced to minimum settings.  I tried for hours to get rid of it but the damn thing still persisted.  It\'s hardly noticeable though, you really have to look for it.
author: White Rabbit
